Awards and Honors

  • 2025 《网络空间安全科学学报》2024-2025年度优秀学术论文
  • 2025 第一届 HISEC 杯全国高校汽车信息安全挑战赛 优秀奖
  • 2024 Third Prize of the 3rd NVDB-CAVD Cup Automotive Information Security Finals
  • 2024 Ministry of Industry and Information Technology's National Vulnerability Database
    Original Supercritical Vulnerability Certificate
  • 2023 Recipient of National Excellent Young Scientists Fund Program
  • 2022 Hangzhou West Lake Pearl Project Overseas High-Level Young Talent
  • 2022 Zhejiang University Qizhen Outstanding Young Scholar
  • 2021 NVIDIA Patent Award
  • 2020 NVIDIA NTECH Conference Best Paper Award (1st Place)
  • 2016 IEEE HOST Best Paper Award Nomination
